title: Quantum Timeline Hacker
description: A reality-shifting cyber puzzle game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript where players navigate across three alternate timelines (Reality A / B / C) to solve interconnected challenges. Features a real-time timeline switching mechanic (T key), environment-dependent object states, adaptive AI security drones, interactive terminal hacking nodes, and multi-layered puzzle-based door unlocking systems for a dynamic and strategic gameplay experience.
features: Three alternate timelines (Reality A / B / C)
Seamless restart and level progression system
